ProgramElementMissionDescription.val: This Program Element funds Aviation Ground Support Equipment (AGSE) developmental testing and acquisition of prototypes to enhance the functionality of current and future aircraft maintenance equipment. This will be accomplished by identifying more effective aircraft maintenance equipment, validating new maintenance concepts, improving machine interfaces, updating aircraft maintenance processes, and developing improved diagnostic technologies which will reduce Operation and Support costs. This program provides for the development of rapid battle repair procedures, tools, ground handling, and test equipment to speed the return of aircraft to a fully mission capable status. Included in this program are:  Tool Set, Aviation Unit Maintenance (TS, AUM) (formerly Aviation Unit Maintenance Shop Set), Self-propelled Crane Aircraft Maintenance and Positioning Increment II (SCAMP II) Type 2 (Expeditionary Variant), Pitot Static Test Set (PSTS), Aviation Ground Power Unit Next Generation (AGPU Nex Gen), Modernized Flexible Engine Diagnostic System (MFEDS), Modernized Maintenance Stands (MMS), and development of support equipment required for maintenance of modernized/future force aircraft.

SummaryExplanation.val: FY 2020 budget adjustment of -$3.766 million from the President's Budget 2019 submission was in support of Army modernization priorities.

ProjectMissionDescription.val: This Project funds Aviation Ground Support Equipment (AGSE) developmental testing and acquisition of prototypes to enhance the functionality of current and future aircraft maintenance equipment. This will be accomplished by identifying more effective aircraft maintenance equipment, validating new maintenance concepts, improving machine interfaces, updating aircraft maintenance processes, and developing improved diagnostic technologies which will reduce Operation and Support costs. This program provides for the development of rapid battle repair procedures, tools, ground handling, and test equipment to speed the return of aircraft to a fully mission capable status. Included in this program are:  Tool Set, Aviation Unit Maintenance (TS, AUM) (formerly Aviation Unit Maintenance Shop Set), Self-propelled Crane Aircraft Maintenance and Positioning Increment II (SCAMP II) Type 2 (Expeditionary Variant), Pitot Static Test Set (PSTS), Aviation Ground Power Unit Next Generation (AGPU Nex Gen), Modernized Flexible Engine Diagnostic System (MFEDS), Modernized Maintenance Stands (MMS), and development of support equipment required for maintenance of modernized/future force aircraft.

Description.val: The Tool Set, Aviation Unit Maintenance consists of three deployable shelters which provide tool loads required for unit-level aviation maintenance tasks.

Text.val: Completed the Physical Configuration Audit, modification Work Order verification, Technical Manual verification, Electrical Power Consumption test, and the Rail Impact Test. Obtained Air Force Internal Air Transport Certification, safety verification, and completed transportability certification.

Description.val: The SCAMP II, Type 2 will remove and replace major aircraft components (maintenance lifting) in support of Army Aviation Maintenance. Type 2 supports maintenance on unimproved, austere locations, split operations and downed aircraft recovery.

Text.val: Contract awarded for 12 Low Rate Production Models.
Conduct Customer Test and Logistics Demonstration/Tech Manual Verification.

AppChangeSummary.val: Will complete Customer Test and Logistics Demonstration/Tech Manual Verification in FY19.

Description.val: PSTS is a portable aircraft air data systems tester which provides the capability of troubleshooting, repairing, and verifying proper operation of flight critical aircraft air data systems.

Text.val: Conduct Acceptance Tests and Airworthiness Release and Safety Conformation.
Conduct logistics demonstrations, verify tech manual and develop TDP.

AppChangeSummary.val: The logistics demonstration and tech manual verification require less resources than the Acceptance Tests and Airworthiness Release efforts.

Title.val: Aviation Ground Power Unit Next Generation (AGPU Next Gen)

Description.val: The AGPU Next Gen provides external hydraulic, pneumatic, and AC/DC electrical power to meet Army helicopter servicing requirements.

Text.val: The funds are being used to develop and build two Aviation Ground Support Testers that can be used to verify the outputs of the Commercial Off the Shelf AGPUs.
Conduct testing of the AGPU Next Gen to secure an Airworthiness requirements memoradum.
Begin the Initial Operational Test and Evaluation (IOT&E) of the AGPU Next Gen candidates.

AppChangeSummary.val: Increase is due to the transition to start the qualification process of the Next Generation Aviation Ground Power Unit.

Description.val:
The MFEDS is an advanced technology engine test system designed to test and verify flight readiness of engines
removed from aircraft for maintenance.

Text.val: Funds were used in the application of a modification workorder to the Flexible Engine Diagnostic System.

Description.val:
The Modernized Maintenance Stand provides a stable work platform for aircraft maintainers from ground level to the
rotor systems. It enhances the occupational safety environment during scheduled and unscheduled maintenance operations.

Text.val: Acceptance test and Safety Conformation were completed.

Description.val: Congressional increase fo the Next Generation Health Monitoring System was placed on the wrong budget line.  This PE Project does not fund this effort.

AppChangeSummary.val: FY2019 funding reflects a Congressional increase that was placed on the wrong line. This Budget Line does not procure Next Generation Health Monitoring Systems.

Description.val: Management Support Services in support of the Aviation Ground Support Equipment Product Management Office.
Technical Engineering Services in support of Airworthiness and Safety certifications for Aviation Ground Support Equipment.

AppChangeSummary.val: Decrease due to Technical Enginnering Services spread between the programs.

AcquisitionStrategy.val: This project is an aggregate of aviation ground support equipment related projects. While the detailed acquisition strategy varies from program to program, the general strategy for each individual program is to complete the development effort through Government test (developmental and operational).  Program documentation for each milestone decision is prepared, as appropriate, concurrently with the development effort.

PerformingActivity.val: AMRDEC, RSA; RTTC, RSA; Aberdeen Test Center,

EventTitle.val: Tool Set, Aviation Unit Maintenance (TS, AUM)
Self-Propelled Crane Aircraft Maintenance and Positioning II, Type 2
